alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:22PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas through 1215 AM CDT... At 1122 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Haigler to 10 miles west of St. Francis. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Francis and Bird City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
